headline: J.D. Vance wins Trumps endorsement after months of groveling
author: Ja'han Jones
sentences:
Politico also said two Mandel donors pressed Trump for an endorsement at a recent campaign event for another Ohio lawmaker, but Trump reportedly said the sight of Mandel almost fighting a nearly-70-year-old man was embarrassing.?
Before last years attack on the U.S. Capitol, Trump encouraged his followers to fight like hell? for him.

Mandels campaign reportedly sent Trumps team a poll showing hed be leading the crowded field significantly if Trump endorsed him, while the same poll showed an endorsement for Vance only placed him in a tie for second  still behind Mandel.

Nonetheless, after NBC News reported on Trumps expected endorsement on Thursday, several GOP officials in Ohio frantically sent a letter to Trump discouraging him from endorsing anyone in the crowded Senate primary.

He is our best chance for victory in what could be a very tough race.?
On Thursday, NBC News reported the mere idea of Vance receiving it over longtime Trump loyalists had driven some Ohio Republicans up a wall.

Vance once swore against Trumps presidency and even wrote a controversial diagnoses of Trump voters, but hes all in on Trumps conspiratorial rhetoric now and has since apologized for his past comments.
Despite parroting Trumps baseless claims of widespread fraud in the 2020 election, as well as Trumps racist stereotypes, there were signs in recent days Vance would be Trump's pick.
After making Republicans grovel while seeking his endorsement in Ohio's GOP primary for U.S. Senate, former President Donald Trump decided to back author and venture capitalist J.D.
The letter, first obtained by Politico, was signed by dozens of local Republican officials who cite Vances past criticism of Trump as a disqualifier in the primary.
Vance may have said some not so great things about me in the past, but he gets it now, and I have seen that in spades,? Trump said in a statement Friday.
While we were working hard in Ohio to support you and Make America Great Again, JD Vance was actively working against your candidacy,? they claimed.
That pitiful retreat, and the chance to bring a former nemesis to heel, is likely what drove Trump to consider endorsing Vance in the first place.
Martin Luther King Jr.s daughter on Twitter  was among those whose team made last-ditch attempts to get Trump to change his mind.
Far-right Senate candidate Josh Mandel  known for almost fighting a primary opponent and repeatedly targeting the Rev.
Evidently, that wasnt permission for them to nearly come to blows during their own Senate campaigns.
Either way, in the battle for Trump's love, Mandel was bested by J.D.
